name: Planning the honeymoon

name: Wedding fashion
description: If you are still not sure about what to pick for your pre-bridal function experiment with these trending wedding gown designs. Take inspiration from these ten gown designs before you buy one for your special occasion.

name: Health and beauty
description: You're beautiful and everybody is aware of that, but wedding planning can be a hectic process. We'll guide you through all the do's and don'ts so that your inner beauty reflects on the outside too.

name: Wedding Stage Decoration
description: Want some help in decorating your stage? Use this 6 ideas for wedding stage decoration to ensure that the focal point of your festivities pops in all of your pictures.

name: Wedding Photographers
description: Bakshi Movies is a wedding photography and videography company based in the city of Sonepat. The team makes sure that they cover all kinds of wedding get-togethers covering from pre-wedding to post-wedding.
